1392.name: OA 60-70B
1392.Applications: Rebuilding wornout parts or protecting new machine parts to increase life that suffer from extreme abrasive wear
1392.Suitable_For: 60-70 HRc Hardfacing wire used in mining, agriculture and steel mills, conveyor chains, agriculture, construction, mixer blades, paddles, cement pumps with excelent abrasion and wear resistance against sand and minerals
